articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il appreciated a performance given by the female brass band of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces.
					 The band put on the stage such colorful numbers as band music "The Party Represents the Care of the General", trumpet solo "The General Is Using the Art of Shrinking the Earth", serial songs of band music "Song of Thanks", brass quartet "For My Only Motherland", saxophone ensemble "A Thriving Nation Is in Sight" and trumpet trio "Higher and Faster".
					
					 He extended thanks to the artistes of the female brass band, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that they presented a splendid concert rich in ideological contents and high in artistry and replete with the spirit of the era of Songun Korea. 
					
					 He advanced the tasks which would serve as guidelines for their creative work and performing activities, expressing expectation and conviction that the female brass band would give fuller play to the might of the revolutionary soldier artists unit by firmly preserving its peculiar character. 
					
					 Among the audience were Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, and other leading officials of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Pyong Sam, director of the Political Bureau of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, KPA General Hyon Chol Hae and other commanding officers of the army and armed forces organs.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets St. Kitts PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets St. Kitts PM
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim Sunday sent a message of greetings to Denzil Douglas, prime minister of Saint Kitts and Nevis, on the occasion of the 27th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The participants of the 12th Pyongyang International Film Festival visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Sunday to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung.
					 They paid respects in humble reverence to the President who made an immortal contribution to the development of friendly relations among countries and the cause of global independence.  
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Yonsan Army-People Power Station Completed
articles.content:
Yonsan Army-People Power Station Completed
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The Yonsan Army-People Station built in North Hwanghae Province went operational with due ceremony on Saturday. 
					 A rest home, dwelling houses, a hostel, goat farm, grazing route extending tens of kilometers and a fish-farming pool were built and more than 100,000 trees were planted along with the power station, drastically changing the appearance in the surrounding areas. 
					
					Thanks from General Secretary Kim Jong Il to the builders, officials and working people who participated in the construction of the power station was conveyed.
					
					 A completion address made by Choe Ryong Hae, chief secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, was followed by speeches.

articles.title: Women's Football Match Held between DPRK, UK
articles.content:
Women's Football Match Held between DPRK, UK
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The April 25 women's football team of the DPRK and the visiting Middlesbrough Football Club Ladies' Team, UK, had a friendly match on Sunday to mark the tenth anniversary of the opening of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
					 The April 25 team won the match 6:2.

articles.title: S. Korean Ministry of Unification under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Ministry of Unification under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The exercise for "stabilizing the north" staged by the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers in August was reportedly spearheaded by the south Korean Ministry of Unification. This is a very serious action which can never go overlooked, observes Minju Joson Sunday in a signed commentary.
					 By taking an active part in the large-scale war exercise for the invasion of the north and spearheading the "stabilization" exercise, far from putting an end to its moves for confrontation with compatriots, the Ministry of Unification brought to light its warlike nature, the commentary says, and goes on:.
					
					 The sincere and consistent efforts made by the DPRK side for reconciliation and unity of the nation and its independent reunification have failed to pay off. The ministry is mainly to blame for this as it has run amuck to harm the compatriots even though it claims to be in charge of the issues between the north and the south.
					
					 It was only recently that the ministry made delayed publication of initiative measures taken by the DPRK side for reconciliation and cooperation of the nation in a bid to prevent them from being known to the south Korean people. It, therefore, came under strong fire by the public opinion. But the coteries of the ministry tried hard to bar the inter-Korean relations from making improvement, talking about "sincerity" and "precondition".
					
					 The ministry did only treacherous acts challenging the desire and wish of the nation as evidenced by its act of spearheading the above-said exercise and speaking ill of the DPRK-proposed measures supported by the people.
					
					 The clan of the ministry had better come to its senses though belatedly, apologize for the war exercise for "stabilizing the north" before the nation and immediately stop its moves for confrontation with compatriots.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The "Pro-Reunification Youth", an association supporting the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification (Pomchonghakryon), on Sept. 14 made public a statement denouncing the puppet authorities' despicable suppression. 
					 The statement accused the court authorities of south Korea of fining a member of the organization for the mere reason that he provided a shelter to Yun Ki Jin, former chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomchonghakryon.
					
					 The court has tightened clampdown on Yun Ki Jin, the statement charged, disclosing the additional investigation being conducted by the prosecution, taking issue with his writing in prison. 
					
					 Intensified suppression of Yun on groundless charges is tantamount to the crackdown upon the reunification movement, it held. 
					
					 No matter how desperately the Lee Myung Bak regime may try with bloodshot eyes to escalate oppression, dictatorship and treacherous confrontation, it can never stamp out justice and truth, the statement said, calling upon all the people to dynamically turn out in the struggle to punish the dictatorial forces.

articles.title: Settlement of Issue of Comfort Women Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Settlement of Issue of Comfort Women Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The Kwangju City "Assembly" of south Korea adopted a resolution in demand of the settlement of the issue of comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army on Sept. 15.
					 The resolution demanded the Japanese government publicly admit, make apology and fulfill legal responsibility for the inhumane crimes committed by Japan during the past war of aggression by forcibly taking away great number of women of Asian countries and forcing them into the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. 
					
					 Japan should set up administrative and legal systems for an apology and reparation to the victims of comfort women and correctly record the crimes of sexual slavery in the history textbooks to give correct education to the younger generation, the resolution urged.
					
					 It stressed the need for the Japanese Diet to enact a special law for the settlement of the issue of comfort women at an early date. 
					
					 It also underscored the need for the south Korean authorities to support the activities of the victims and non-governmental organizations desirous of the settlement and urge the Japanese government to liquidate the shameful past and stop distortion of history.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Observed
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Observed
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Lectures took place in Democratic Congo and Tanzania, a film show in Ukraine and an opening ceremony of the Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Mexico from September 4 to 11 on the occasion of the 62nd founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 On display at the venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos showing their immortal exploits, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicraft associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo said that the DPRK shapes all line and policies to suit the actual conditions of the country and meet the interests of its people guided by the Juche idea founded by the President and has achieved single-minded unity among the leader, the party and the masses. It is a socialist state centered on the popular masses which pursues such popular policies as the systems of free education and free medical care, he added. 
					
					 The chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups said that since the foundation of the DPRK it has pushed ahead with the revolution and the construction upholding the banner of the Juche idea as a result of which it has turned into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence. 
					
					 Under the veteran and tested Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, the DPRK is now winning only victories despite all the challenges, he stressed. 
					
					 Korean film "The Arch of Triumph" was shown at a film show.

articles.title: Newspaper "Banner of Mt. Paektu" Founded in Russia
articles.content:
Newspaper "Banner of Mt. Paektu" Founded in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- The newspaper "Banner of Mt. Paektu" was founded by followers of the Juche idea and the Songun idea in the Far East of Russia on September 9 on the occasion of the 62nd founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 The first page of the No. 1 issue of the paper carries portraits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and letters "Banner of Mt. Paektu" against the background of the Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu and the national flag of the DPRK. Seen in the paper is an article introducing brisk activities now underway in the Far East of Russia to significantly greet the centenary of birth of the President. 
					
					 Appearing on the third and fifth pages of the paper are articles praising the Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the essence, validity and vitality of the Songun politics together with photos showing the revolutionary activities of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The paper on its second, fourth, sixth, seventh and eighth pages carries photo-accompanied articles introducing the undying exploits of nation-building performed by the President, significant celebrations held in the Far East of Russia on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership and positive activities for the study and dissemination of the Juche idea and the Songun idea and for solidarity with the Korean people.
